item.title: Buy the dip on regional bank Zions after 'excessive' sell-off, Baird says
item.description: Baird analyst David George's $65 price target corresponds to an upside of 39% for shares of the regional bank.

item.title: Santoli's Thursday market wrap-up: Broad index-level selling follows four days of erratic action
item.description: The latest move lower came after several failed rally attempts

item.title: These companies reporting next week have a history of posting beats and rallying
item.description: Traders can look to stocks including Intuitive Surgical and AI play Amphenol for names that tend to rally upon posting quarterly financial results.

item.title: Vanguard is 'cautiously optimistic' on bonds right now. Where it is finding opportunities to lock in yield
item.description: As investors head into the end of the year, there's an opportunity to lock in durable income further out the curve, according to Vanguard.

item.title: A new uptrend phase is brewing in this discount retailer, according to the charts
item.description: David Keller goes through the technical outlook of this retail stock.
